item.title: R to @conduitxyz: Superposition is one of the first Conduit rollups to take advantage of @arbitrum Fast Withdrawals! No seven-day waiting period for bridging funds off the chain.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description: Superposition is one of the first Conduit rollups to take advantage of @arbitrum Fast Withdrawals! No seven-day waiting period for bridging funds off the chain.

item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Superposition mainnet is here!

@Superpositionso is the @arbitrum L3 with native yield and an onchain orderbook for ecosystem liquidity sharing, powered by Stylus.

Superposition‚Äôs stack includes tech from Conduit Marketplace partners like:
@LayerZero_Core canonical bridge
@superbridgeapp native bridge UI
@decentxyz onboarding
@circle's Bridged USDC standard

nitter.freedit.eu/Superpositionso/status/1878789316018926027#m

item.dc:creator: @nickwh8te
item.description:
People don't understand how much DA high performance L2s will consume

@EclipseFND posting 10GB+ per day is just the warm up

Eclipse will scale significantly from here and meanwhile @movementlabsxyz, @rise_chain, @abundance_xyz, and @conduitxyz G2 chains are on the way

item.title: R to @conduitxyz: Powerloom gives builders a new way to feed onchain data into their apps, with a decentralized network of snapshotters and validators ensuring all information delivered is accurate.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description: Powerloom gives builders a new way to feed onchain data into their apps, with a decentralized network of snapshotters and validators ensuring all information delivered is accurate.

item.title:
Just launched: @Powerloom Mainnet, the L2 that gives builders the onchain data they need.
Powerloom is built on @Optimism OP Stack, settles on Ethereum, and uses @eigen_da for data availability, plus @superbridgeapp for native bridge UI.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Just launched: @Powerloom Mainnet, the L2 that gives builders the onchain data they need.

Powerloom is built on @Optimism OP Stack, settles on Ethereum, and uses @eigen_da for data availability, plus @superbridgeapp for native bridge UI.

nitter.freedit.eu/Powerloom/status/1877485168241311883#m

item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: Holocene also live on all the @conduitxyz networks
We've upgraded to Holocene 27 @Optimism mainnets, spanning across multiple configurations
- l2/l3s - eth blobs and alt-da (@celestia and @eigen_da) - with ETH and custom gas tokens
Seamlessly ‚ú®
